###User Defined Function###
_WinAPI_RectIsEmpty

###Description###
Determins whether a rectangle is empty

###Syntax###
#Include <WinAPI.au3>
_WinAPI_RectIsEmpty(ByRef $tRect)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$tRect
	$tagRect structure
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
True: Rectangle is empty (all values are zero)
False: Rectangle is not empty

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
$tagRect
